Text: Henwoods Online ApplicationsHi Kevin Here all the people who have tried our online applications and subscribe to it Please let me know when you have time to do another trial It appears a lot of people at Enron have an interest in the information we provide Cindy Irvin Kelly Holman Hicham mailto G Britt mailto Whitman Mo mailtoAlberto Elafandi mailto Alberto mailto Olimon John Kinser Enron Portland is a client of NextGen GenReporter and evaluating GenSpy UsersEnron Portland James Bruce mailtoJames nroncom James nroncom Michael Schilmoeller Jeffery Oh Julie Sarnowski mailto Thankyou Mark Barber Sales Consultant Energy Data Services mailto ex wwwHenwoodEnergycom Henwood Energy Services Inc Solutions to EmPower Your Business NextGen a revolutionary new online service from Henwood that tracks proposed generation units and provides instant access to the data without any software to install or database to maintain NextGen helps decisionmakers by supplying them with a database of proposed generation unit information and allowing them to filter through specific parameters The program has the capability to display graphs based on individual unit development cycles and compare those figures against a specified regional load forecast GenReporter provides online hourly operational data for over fossil fuel electric generation plants across North America million records available instantly at your fingertips without any software to install or database to maintain GenReporter provides hourly detail on Heat Input Energy Output MW or Steam Operation Time and SO NOx and CO emissions as well as standard Unit descriptive data eg unit type capacities and fuel Easy to use filters and pointandclick navigation tools allow users to quickly locate specific generators for detailed review and analysis viewed in hourly detail in tabular or chart format MarketWatch includes hourly electric prices for published cash and forwards markets from various data sources including each of the Independent System Operator ISO markets in North America Europe and Australia and can incorporate any data sources that you currently subscribe to MarketWatch has a userfriendly interface that facilitates quick data inquiries instantly at your fingertips without any software to install or database to maintain The results of the queries can be presented in tabular or chart form The MarketWatch price database is updated on a daily basis
